channel.title: How do i make a ::master command?
channel.description: How do i make a command that makes all my skills 99? and make it for mods and admins and owners? please give me a tut for it and make it like on a 3 year old level tell me WHERE and what to put in please.

item.title: How do i make a ::master command?
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Start from here then:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }
Go up to the number of skills there are. Then just put 14m exp on each.

Example:
0 is attack 2 is str. 3 is range 4 is pray 6 is mage ( I donâ€™t know if those are really the numbers.) search more for that.

Read full topic
